text: <@U015D2TM691> Thanks for reply! That is a good idea, and I initially thought about this too. However, I'm worried this will cause the Blog Posts to lose their tracking statistics/rankings on HubSpot?

Hello everyone! Could somebody help with the problem:
CRM Extensions tab displays nothing. This is on the `Monitoring` page of a HubSpot app developer account website.
The error appears in the console:
And this is how the page looks:
FYI, I solved it by re-creating the app.
I do agree with that. We ought to try that out on a couple of pages.

I am trying to use Operations Hub - Workflow custom code. The code is working when I test it individually, and it has output as Boolean value. I want to use output data late in the next workflow in “Value Equals Branch” but my workflow always goes to “Not Meet” branch despite the data output whether is true or false, any thought?

Hey all, I. have a zapier zap using "push" that lets me push blog articles I find to an RSS feed. Is there some sort of non-zapier solution that would let me do the same but for a HubDB table rather than an RSS feed.
Is anyone else seeing CRM cards sending invalid v2 signatures? We’re seeing different signature logic than previously before causing failures without any changes on our end.
I wonder if it's related to this: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/introducing-version-3-of-webhook-signatures>
but existing signatures should be working still...
That’s my thought as well. Our verification still works for regular webhooks, but not CRM cards. Both use the same logic on our end.
Can someone explain how to edit start and end dates of the built-in "marketing events" custom object?
looks like they are not editable?
I see a note in the docs that the property can be edited via the API...but I just want to set the value
Can someone please help me understand WHY the start/end date would require a secure API call? That causes such a ruckus

Hello everyone I'm trying to move a theme from one account to another and I'm getting an error about external dependencies. I've made sure all my images are being pulled from my image file and not sure what the next step should be. I can't think of what those dependencies could be. Anyone have any ideas on what or how to look for these. Thanks
<@UTQQ4TXCH> what's the specific error?
Here is all I get.
I was hoping I could patch it in the API but doesn't look like that's an option: `"message": "Cannot modify HubSpot defined object type",`

Hey I hope you are well, 
I have this email I am looking to send out by tomorrow and I am having trouble uploading it as-is into the HubSpot HTML builder. I spoke to support and they mentioned it could be because the original email code is from MailChimp. I am not too familiar with code although here is the original email I am looking to send: <https://mailchi.mp/flosusa/black-friday-holiday-2021-promo?e=1564978c3b>
here is the HTML version: <https://us5.campaign-archive.com/feed?u=cd58706acbb75d903325e97d1&id=16e34c320c>
 and I would like it the same way just with our header and footer.
 
Could you kindly help me take a look at to code to see if that is the error or if there its else where I would like to have this email go out by tomorrow and I am currently stuck?
Thank you so much response and solution will be highly appreciated
